overview: SOULFISH II is fly-fishing's ultimate adventure. A multidimensional story about fly-fishing today & an in-depth look at some of the sport's most interesting characters. Experience what it's like & witness some of the most explosive & breathtaking footage ever captured from 4 continents. 130 min. Covers locations: Mongolia, Louisiana, Belize, Mexico, Egypt, B.C., Hawaii & California.
title: Soulfish 2
